page.title: 17 WEEDON'S CLUBS & PASTIMES
page.content: Weedon's clubs meet in either the village hall,the school hall or the scout hut.In {the village hall} are Play Group,Majorettes,Aerobics,Bingo, Badminton and Dancing.The Brownies and the Weedon Players meet at school. There are also Scouts,Cubs,Guides, Ranger Guides and Adventure Scouts. *** CUBS & BROWNIES *** I am a {Cub} and I think they are very good.They play games and learn how to do things like cooking.Cubs are about 7-10 years old.Scouts are about 10-15 years old.Cubs wear caps with a yellow neck-a-chief but Scouts wear trousers,a short sleeved shirt and a beret. I am a {Brownie} and I wear a brown shirt-dress,a belt,tie and a bobble hat.Brownies are about 7-10 years old. We play games,go camping and collect money for charities.
